title: Mackerel with rhubarb chutney and orange and chicory salad
description: Tangy rhubarb really complements the rich, oily mackerel and a light citrus salad rounds it all off perfectly.
ingredients: 2cm/¾in piece root ginger, peeled and finely chopped
2 whole mackerel, gutted, filleted and pin boned
1 stick rhubarb, sliced into ribbons using a vegetable peeler
